title: Bomb Maker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make a bomb during the day and toss a bomb at someone during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the day, you can make a bomb.
- You will say an ingredient to put in your bomb, and the host will give you an effect based on your word.
- After making a bomb, you may throw it at someone, dealing a powerful attack as well as doing whatever the ingredient adds to it.
- If you do not make a bomb during the day, you will be given a Basic Bomb which has no effect (just a plain powerful attack).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
